body.subject: ws1 quality review approved - excellent coverage, proceed with ws2
body.summary: Conducted quality review for ws1 (Domain & Contracts). Implementation.json verified, code reviewed, test evidence validated. Verdict: APPROVED. Coverage 95.45% exceeds requirement (>= 80%), all 35 tests passing, mypy/lint clean, Clean Architecture boundaries respected, AC9 met. Ready to proceed with ws2.
key_points: ws1_t1 (Intent, Skill): coverage 97.73% (target >= 90%), 12 tests, all passing
ws1_t2 (6 domain entities): coverage 94.70% (target >= 85%), 23 tests, all passing
Code quality: Clean Architecture boundaries respected (domain layer isolated), proper validation, good docstrings
Acceptance Criteria AC9 met: Domain layer contains contracts for Intent, TaskPlan, TaskStep, Skill, SkillResult, MemorySnapshot, SafetyViolation
concerns: ws2-ws8 not yet implemented (16 tasks remaining) - expected, proceed sequentially
Integration tests will be added in subsequent workstreams (ws2, ws3, ws4, etc.) - as planned
Security tests and performance tests will be added per plan.json in ws8 - as planned
Current implementation is partial (11% of Epic 28), but ws1 quality is excellent
body.action_needed: ws1 approved - proceed with ws2 (Memory Fabric + Persona Merge). Continue following TDD approach, maintain coverage >= 80%, ensure all tests pass, mypy/lint clean. Update implementation.json after each workstream completion. After all 18 tasks completed, provide full test_evidence for complete quality review.
recommendations: Continue excellent work - maintain same quality standards for ws2-ws8
Keep implementation.json updated after each workstream
Ensure integration tests are added as workstreams progress
Security and performance tests will be critical in ws8
